events.message: I just received my order, but unfortunately the product is scratched and appears to be defective. I am really disappointed with the condition it arrived in.
The issue has been categorized as product defect based on the customer's description of damage and scratches.
A support agent has been assigned to handle the customer's case regarding the defective product.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your product. Let's get this sorted out as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and any visible damage on the product so we can better assess the situation?
I have attached several photos showing the scratches and the defect on the product. Please let me know how we can proceed.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would like to receive a replacement, please. Thank you for your quick response and help.
Your request for a replacement has been processed. You will receive a confirmation email with tracking details shortly.
We are checking in to ensure you received the replacement product and that it meets your expectations. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
As there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for choosing our service.
